com.direwolfdigital.cake.customchoice.pr: Would you like to leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed? If you do, this Pokémon and all cards attached to it will be shuffled into your deck.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: You may leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed. If you do, shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.
Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance. Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon.
product.gameplay.deckbox.kanto.bulbasaur: A fresh green deck box shows a smiling Bulbasaur, with a Grass Energy background pattern.
product.gameplay.deckbox.kanto.charmande: A bold red deck box shows Charmander ready to battle, with a Fire Energy background pattern.
A bright blue deck box shows Squirtle at the ready, with a Water Energy background pattern.
Fresh green card sleeves show a smiling Bulbasaur, with a Grass Energy background pattern.
product.gameplay.sleeve.kanto.charmander: Bold red card sleeves show Charmander ready to battle, with a Fire Energy background pattern.
product.gameplay.sleeve.kanto.squirtle.d: Bright blue card sleeves show Squirtle at the ready, with a Water Energy background pattern.
